issue.title: [Go][Parquet] Add pqarrow package for direct Parquet <--> Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Last large portion of code to get merged. anything after this is individual bug fixes or improvements. With the exception of features that aren't yet implemented in Go (like Dictionary Arrays and such) this brings the Go Parquet library pretty much to mostly feature parity with the C++ Parquet Library.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15331?focusedCommentId=17482171) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12149
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12149>
